mapper.select: select i.item_idx, i.re_manager_idx, i.item_name, i.item_info, i.item_packing, i.item_category, i.item_price, i.item_sale, i.item_stock, i.item_status, i.item_readcount, i.item_date, f.file1, m.manager_brandname, truncate( a.board_star_score,1) AS board_star_score FROM item i LEFT JOIN file_item f ON i.item_idx = f.rf_item_idx JOIN manager m ON i.re_manager_idx = m.manager_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.BOARD_ITEM_IDX , avg(s.board_star_score) as board_star_score FROM board b join board_star s on b.board_idx = s.rf_board_idx group by b.BOARD_ITEM_IDX) a ON i.item_idx = a.BOARD_ITEM_IDX WHERE f.file1 NOT LIKE '%상세%' ORDER BY i.item_idx ;
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET item_readcount = item_readcount + 1 WHERE item_idx = #{item_idx}
mapper.select: select i.item_idx, i.re_manager_idx, i.item_name, i.item_info, i.item_packing, i.item_category, i.item_price, i.item_sale, i.item_stock, i.item_status, i.item_readcount, i.item_date, f.file1, f.file2, m.manager_brandname, a.count, truncate( b.board_star_score,1) AS board_star_score FROM item i LEFT JOIN file_item f ON i.item_idx = f.rf_item_idx JOIN manager m ON i.re_manager_idx = m.manager_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT board_item_idx , count(*) as count FROM board WHERE board_item_idx = #{i.item_idx}) a on i.ITEM_IDX= a.board_item_idx LEFT JOIN (SELECT b.board_item_idx , avg(s.board_star_score) as board_star_score FROM board b join board_star s on b.board_idx = s.rf_board_idx WHERE b.board_item_idx GROUP BY b.board_item_idx) b ON i.item_idx = a.board_item_idx WHERE f.file1 NOT LIKE '%상세%' and i.item_idx = #{i.item_idx} ORDER BY i.item_idx DESC
